summary: ENGINE REVS UNEXPLAINABLE, CAUSING UNEXPECTED AND DIFFICULT TO CONTROL SUDDEN ACCELERATION OF VEHICLE.  EXTREME BRAKE APPLICATION NEEDED TO STOP VEHICLE DURING INCIDENTS.  HAS OCCURRED IN EXCESS OF 20 TIMES SO FAR DURING THE LIFE OF THE VEHICLE, NEARLY CAUSING ACCIDENT ON SEVERAL OCCASIONS.  FORD DEALER UNABLE TO IDENTIFY THE PROBLEM.*JB
